
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel get source

Display Camel route source code


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel get source [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--filter` | Filter source by filename (multiple names can be separated by comma) |  | String
| `--sort` | Sort source by name | name | String
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
